airport_transfer.title: Airport Transfer Planning
airport_transfer.description: Plan trips to and from Logan Airport
airport_transfer.prompt: Plan a trip from {origin} to Logan Airport (42.3743, -71.0304) for {date} at {time}. Consider luggage and accessibility needs.
examples: Plan a trip from South Station to Logan Airport for tomorrow at 8:00 AM
Plan a trip from Harvard Square to Logan Airport for Friday at 6:00 PM with luggage

commute_planning.title: Daily Commute Planning
commute_planning.description: Plan regular commute routes with real-time data
commute_planning.prompt: Plan my daily commute from {home} to {work} for {day_of_week} at {departure_time}. Show me the fastest and most reliable options.
examples: Plan my daily commute from Cambridge to Downtown Boston for Monday at 8:30 AM
Plan my daily commute from Brookline to Kendall Square for Tuesday at 9:00 AM

event_planning.title: Event Trip Planning
event_planning.description: Plan trips to major events and venues
event_planning.prompt: Plan a trip from {origin} to {event_venue} for {event_date} at {event_time}. Consider event crowds and parking.
examples: Plan a trip from MIT to Fenway Park for tonight at 7:00 PM
Plan a trip from Harvard Square to TD Garden for Saturday at 8:00 PM

accessibility_planning.title: Accessible Trip Planning
accessibility_planning.prompt: Plan a wheelchair-accessible trip from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time}. Ensure all stations have elevators.
examples: Plan a wheelchair-accessible trip from Alewife to South Station for tomorrow at 10:00 AM
Plan a wheelchair-accessible trip from Back Bay to Harvard Square for Friday at 2:00 PM

late_night_travel.title: Late Night Travel Planning
late_night_travel.description: Plan trips during late night hours
late_night_travel.prompt: Plan a late night trip from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time}. Consider limited service hours.
examples: Plan a late night trip from Downtown Boston to Cambridge for tonight at 11:30 PM
Plan a late night trip from Harvard Square to Brookline for Saturday at 12:30 AM

weekend_excursion.title: Weekend Excursion Planning
weekend_excursion.description: Plan leisure trips with relaxed timing
weekend_excursion.prompt: Plan a weekend trip from {origin} to {destination} for {date}. I'm flexible on timing and prefer scenic routes.
examples: Plan a weekend trip from Boston to Salem for this Saturday
Plan a weekend trip from Cambridge to Revere Beach for Sunday

student_commute.title: Student Commute Planning
student_commute.description: Plan trips for students with budget considerations
student_commute.prompt: Plan a student-friendly trip from {origin} to {campus} for {day} at {time}. Consider student discounts and campus shuttle connections.
examples: Plan a student-friendly trip from Allston to MIT for Monday at 9:00 AM
Plan a student-friendly trip from Somerville to Harvard for Tuesday at 10:00 AM

medical_appointment.title: Medical Appointment Planning
medical_appointment.description: Plan trips to medical facilities with extra time
medical_appointment.prompt: Plan a trip from {origin} to {medical_facility} for {date} at {appointment_time}. Add extra buffer time for medical appointments.
examples: Plan a trip from Cambridge to Mass General Hospital for tomorrow at 2:00 PM
Plan a trip from Brookline to Brigham and Women's Hospital for Friday at 10:30 AM

shopping_trip.title: Shopping Trip Planning
shopping_trip.prompt: Plan a shopping trip from {origin} to {shopping_destination} for {date}. Consider carrying bags and multiple stops.
examples: Plan a shopping trip from Boston to Assembly Row for this Saturday
Plan a shopping trip from Cambridge to Prudential Center for Sunday

family_trip.title: Family Trip Planning
family_trip.description: Plan trips suitable for families with children
family_trip.prompt: Plan a family-friendly trip from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time}. Consider strollers and child-friendly routes.
examples: Plan a family-friendly trip from Cambridge to Boston Children's Museum for Saturday at 10:00 AM
Plan a family-friendly trip from Brookline to New England Aquarium for Sunday at 1:00 PM

business_meeting.title: Business Meeting Planning
business_meeting.description: Plan trips for business meetings with reliability focus
business_meeting.prompt: Plan a business trip from {origin} to {business_location} for {date} at {meeting_time}. Prioritize reliability and professional appearance.
examples: Plan a business trip from Cambridge to Financial District for tomorrow at 9:00 AM
Plan a business trip from Boston to Kendall Square for Thursday at 2:00 PM

service_disruption.title: Service Disruption Planning
service_disruption.description: Plan alternative routes when primary service is disrupted
service_disruption.prompt: The {affected_line} is experiencing delays. Plan an alternative route from {origin} to {destination} avoiding {affected_line}.
examples: The Red Line is experiencing delays. Plan an alternative route from Harvard to Downtown avoiding the Red Line
The Green Line is experiencing delays. Plan an alternative route from Boston College to Downtown avoiding the Green Line

weather_emergency.title: Weather Emergency Planning
weather_emergency.description: Plan trips during severe weather conditions
weather_emergency.prompt: There's severe weather affecting transit. Plan a safe route from {origin} to {destination} with weather considerations.
examples: There's severe weather affecting transit. Plan a safe route from Cambridge to Boston
There's severe weather affecting transit. Plan a safe route from Brookline to Downtown

fastest_route.title: Fastest Route Planning
fastest_route.description: Find the fastest route regardless of transfers
fastest_route.prompt: Find the fastest possible route from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time}. Minimize total travel time.
examples: Find the fastest possible route from Alewife to South Station for tomorrow at 8:00 AM
Find the fastest possible route from Harvard to Logan Airport for Friday at 6:00 PM

fewest_transfers.title: Minimal Transfer Planning
fewest_transfers.description: Find routes with the fewest transfers
fewest_transfers.prompt: Plan a route from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time} with the fewest possible transfers.
examples: Plan a route from Cambridge to Downtown with the fewest possible transfers for tomorrow at 9:00 AM
Plan a route from Brookline to Kendall Square with the fewest possible transfers for Tuesday at 10:00 AM

scenic_route.title: Scenic Route Planning
scenic_route.description: Find routes with scenic views and interesting stops
scenic_route.prompt: Plan a scenic route from {origin} to {destination} for {date}. Include interesting stops and views along the way.
examples: Plan a scenic route from Boston to Cambridge for this Saturday
Plan a scenic route from Cambridge to Brookline for Sunday

budget_friendly.title: Budget-Friendly Planning
budget_friendly.prompt: Plan the most budget-friendly route from {origin} to {destination} for {date} at {time}. Consider fare costs and discounts.
examples: Plan the most budget-friendly route from Cambridge to Downtown for tomorrow at 8:00 AM
Plan the most budget-friendly route from Brookline to Logan Airport for Friday at 6:00 PM

usage_instructions.how_to_use: Replace the variables in curly braces with actual values to create a complete trip planning prompt.
best_practices: Always specify both origin and destination coordinates when possible
Include specific times for more accurate planning
Mention special requirements (accessibility, luggage, etc.) upfront
Consider weather and service alerts for real-time planning
usage_instructions.coordinate_format: Use latitude,longitude format (e.g., 42.3601,-71.0942) for precise locations
usage_instructions.address_format: Use street addresses for general locations when coordinates aren't available

metadata.description: Comprehensive collection of trip planning prompts for common scenarios
